testsuite.test:
vibrationSetting Is ON or OFF
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

vibrationSetting Verify ON
Instructions: 1) Make sure that your phone has turned ON the vibrate mode. 2) Press 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

vibrationSetting Verify OFF
Instructions: 1) Make sure that your phone has turned OFF the vibrate mode. 2) Press 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
